name: Galarian Stunfisk
description: The Trap Pokémon. Its conspicuous lips lure prey in as it lies in wait in the mud. When prey gets close, Stunfisk clamps its jagged steel fins down on them.

abilities.name: Mimicry
abilities.description: This Pokémon's type changes depending on the terrain. If a Terrain move is active, this Pokémon's type becomes the Terrain move's type. This Pokémon's type reverts once the Terrain move deactivates.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.
